param.name: use_ldapauth
param.label: Use LDAP Auth Plugin Settings
param.description: Uses the settings from the LDAP auth plugin for the following values

param.name: use_commit
param.label: Actually Commit Sync
param.description: Will only update the database when YES is selected - useful to test sync settings.

param.name: use_addisable
param.label: Use AD Disabled Identifier
param.description: Map accounts to disabled using the AD disabled identifier

param.name: ldap_filterstring
param.label: Filter String
param.description: LDAP Filter string used to filter out ldap accounts. LDAP is usually: objectclass=person -- AD is usually: user

param.name: ldap_fullname
param.label: Map FullName
param.description: LDAP tag used for Joomla! User full name. LDAP is usually: cn or fullname -- AD is usually: displayName

param.name: ldap_email
param.label: Map Email
param.description: LDAP tag used for Joomla! User email address. LDAP is usually: mail -- AD is usually: mail

param.name: ldap_uid
param.label: Map User ID
param.description: LDAP tag used for Joomla! User login ID. LDAP is usually: uid -- AD is usually: sAMAccountName
